messages.subject: Shinsengumi! SP corrected link
messages.msgSnippet: So it decided to add the parenthesis to the URL.  Sorry about that.  The link to the main torrent page (not the link to the episode itself) is:
messages.messageBody:
So it decided to add the parenthesis to the URL. Sorry about that. The link to the main torrent page (not the link to the episode itself) is:

http://www.d-addicts.com/forum/torrents.php

phil
